name: IAMJASON
description:
IAMJASON is a point & click adventure with a low res retro style in a dystopian sci-fi setting. You must help Jason defeat the corruption.

The game was developed for the February 2015 MAGS (Monthly Adventure Game Studio) competition which is a 30 day game dev challenge. Games must revolve around the theme of "losing something" and be developed using Adventure Game Studio.
